Name: Anime Tanks Arena
About the game: Join the battle of girls-tanks. Anime Tanks Arena is a small battle game when you play a tank-girl. Tank-girl is a weapon of new generation combining the destroying power of a tanks weapons with anime girls' excellent vision and tactics! Your goal is to hunt down all enemies and destroy them all. Features: Heavily weaponed tanks-girls Join the battle & choose your own side Please Add the game to your Steam Wishlist! The game will cost only $0.99! /
